name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
description: Crisp cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

name: Spinach and Strawberry Salad
description: Fresh spinach, sliced strawberries, almonds, and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Cobb Salad
description: Mixed greens, grilled chicken, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese dressing.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, drizzled with balsamic glaze.
